sent.orig: Corn and corn-based feeds and foods are of concern, including cornmeal and corn grits.
sent.trans: 谷物和以谷物为基料的饲料和食品得到关注，包括麦片和粗碾的谷麦。

sent.orig: In good year corn is hay; in ill year straw is corn.
sent.trans: 丰年粮如草，歉年草为粮。

sent.orig: Zein is the major storage protein of corn and comprises 45%~50% of total protein in corn.
sent.trans: 玉米醇溶蛋白是玉米中主要的贮藏蛋白质，约占总蛋白质的45%~50%。
玉蜀黍又称为印第安玉米。
